scripts.lint: npm run lint:python && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:python: cd src && (ruff check . || flake8 . || echo 'No Python linter found')
scripts.format: npm run format:python && npm run format:frontend
scripts.format:python: cd src && (ruff format . || black . || echo 'No Python formatter found')
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist/ build/ *.egg-info frontend/.next frontend/out && find . -type d -name '__pycache__' -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.preinstall: command -v poetry >/dev/null 2>&1 || { echo 'Poetry is required but not installed. Visit https://python-poetry.org/docs/#installation'; exit 1; }
scripts.postinstall: echo 'âœ“ Installation complete! Run npm run dev to start development servers'
